title: Harley's Angels
description: When teen angel, Harley Jay, gets given the job of being the guardian angel of the troubled, Danny Bourne, neither of them are quite prepared for what happens next.The world is in danger, an immortal enemy wants to dominate the planet and destroy humanity, Harley's band of angels are all Danny has to help him save the day, but is it enough?
author: Leah Smith
